name: Ugetsu Kitan
overview: Ugetsu Kitan is an adventure game in Japanese. It is a collection of loosely connected mystery/horror stories, based on the old book of supernatural tales Ugetsu Monogatari. In the PC-98 version, a young girl guides the player from a busy street to a tent containing a labyrinth occupied by Japanese mythical creatures, in which the player experiences several stories based on the Ugetsu Monogatari, with vignettes from the original scenario in-between.
